detail_desc: Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.
Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.
Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.
Fitted, sleeveless calf-length dress in ribbed jersey.

Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high, frill-trimmed, smocked waist and twisted drawstring with tassels. Buttons made of shell half way down the front and an asymmetric hem finishing in a gathered flounce. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Maxi skirt in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, and gathered seams for width. Lined at the top.
Straight, ankle-length trousers in a viscose crêpe weave. Elasticated waist with a tasselled, twisted drawstring, diagonal side pockets and coconut shell buttons down the legs.
Jacket in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Jacket in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Jacket in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Straight-cut jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with adjustable tabs and metal buckles. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur trims at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with adjustable tabs and metal buckles. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur trims at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in grained imitation leather with notch lapels and a soft faux fur lining. Concealed press-stud fastening at the front, a tie belt and open patch front pockets.

Shirt jacket in twill with a lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal welt front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a zip down the front and a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a zip down the front and a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a zip down the front and a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Concealed side pockets with a zip, and elasticated cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and long sleeves. Recycled polyester lining.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton twill with press-studs down the front and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners at the front. One open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton twill with press-studs down the front and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners at the front. One open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a slightly stretchy weave that is fitted at the top and relaxes at the hips into a softly draping style. Concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric seam at the top. Lined.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a button at the front. Soft cotton lining.
Flared, calf-length skirt in tulle with covered elastication at the waist and a seam creating a flounce at the hem for added width and volume. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a yoke with decorative gathers front and back, and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist that has a frill trim and tie belt. Zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener, patch front pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.

Ankle-length jeans in sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud and tapered legs with a tab and metal buckle at the ankles. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with woven stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist with a decorative floral appliqué and a flared skirt. Soft cotton poplin lining.

Set in an airy cotton weave. Sleeveless, patterned blouse with buttons down the back and a seam and peplum at the hem. Puff shorts with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and around the legs.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a decorative frill trim at the hems.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a decorative frill trim at the hems.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a loose, textured, soft cotton knit with a button at the neckline and ribbed flounce over each shoulder.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a loose, textured, soft cotton knit with a button at the neckline and ribbed flounce over each shoulder.
Shorts in an airy viscose and linen weave. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a frill trim at the top and detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide legs.
Pull-on trousers in soft, slub-weave cotton with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and fake side pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué.
Pull-on trousers in soft, slub-weave cotton with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and fake side pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué.

Jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. Sleeves lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Short, A-line dress in soft cotton denim with a V-shaped opening and ties at the neckline. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seams with decorative gathers for added volume at the hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in a textured weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.

Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Heart-shaped bag in imitation patent leather with a zip at the top and a metal chain shoulder strap. Recycled polyester lining. Depth 3 cm. Width 10.5 cm. Height 11 cm.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy cotton jersey. Visible elastic waistband with a text motif.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy cotton jersey. Visible elastic waistband with a text motif.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, sewn-on bow at the top and short sleeves.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, sewn-on bow at the top and short sleeves.
Block-coloured shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Block-coloured shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Set of a hoodie and leggings in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend. Long-sleeved hoodie with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Skinny fit leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Set of a hoodie and leggings in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend. Long-sleeved hoodie with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Skinny fit leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat, and tapered legs.

Trousers in satin with a high waist that has covered elastication and loops, one with a decorative D-ring. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a tab and D-ring and long, tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Trousers in satin with a high waist that has covered elastication and loops, one with a decorative D-ring. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a tab and D-ring and long, tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves with a frill trim. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
